title: Servers down?
body:
Just started rank 5's game, and DC'd after 1 minute 30 (attempting to reconnect).

Anyone else?

replies.body:
Ok, the match I was in just cancelled...

server screw up? for drophax? *insert conspiracy music here*

Spooky.

This happened only once, yeah?
na in norms we all got dcd

I asked around and someone playing norms is fine...

Might just be a ranked 5's thing..
Same here ranked 5 game and we all got dcd.
